Professions: back end developer, ai engineer, lead generator
description: Join or merge multiple datasets, data sources, or data elements together
typical_use_cases: Combine multiple lead sources into single list
Merge scraped data with enrichment results
Join company data with contact data
Combine CSV files from different scrapers
workflows: Multi-Source Lead Enrichment: Combine Airscale + LinkedIn + Apify
Scrape multiple sources → Combine → Deduplicate → Enrich
multi_source_example: Combine LinkedIn (1K leads) + Google SERP (2K leads) + Google Maps (500 leads) = 3.5K total
